thread.title: Life Time Wants to Develop New Muscles Beyond Health Clubs

author: John D. Stoll
title: Life Time Wants to Develop New Muscles Beyond Health Clubs

organizations.name: time wants to develop new muscles beyond health clubs

text:
Bahram Akradi came to the U.S. from Iran at 17 with an eye on studying engineering and potentially designing airplanes.
Forty years later, he faces a different engineering challenge: building a company that brings fitness, health care, relaxation and work all under one roof.
As founder and chief executive of Life Time Inc., Mr. Akradi already...
